channel.title: Input Field Types on PoppyGo Book
channel.description: Recent content in Input Field Types on PoppyGo Book

item.title: Boolean
item.description: Boolean # The boolean field generates a switch. The output value is true or false Boolean Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: boolean Output # sample_field: true Sample frontmatter output #

item.title: Chips
item.description: Chips # The chips field generates a field that helps creating tags of keywords from entered strings instantly. The output value is an array with strings. Chips Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: chips Output # sample_field: - tag 1 - tag 2

item.title: Date
item.description: Date # The date field generates a date field with a date picker. The output value is a date string. Date field Date picker popup Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: date Output # sample_field: "2021-03-21"

item.title: Hidden
item.description: Hidden # The hidden field is hidden for the user but outputs a default value. Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique default string mandatory default output value Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field default: some value type: hidden Output # sample_field: some value

item.title: Info
item.description: Readonly # The info field is shows a readonly information box. It generates no output. Info field Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique content string mandatory The content of the box in Markdown formatted textent Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field type: info content: |-# Info This is a readonly info field.

item.title: Markdown
item.description: String # The string field generates a field for entering strings. Multiline string values are allowed by enableing this property. Single markdown Multi line markdown Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element multiLine boolean optional (default false) Enable multi line value preview boolean optional (default false) Enable preview field with rendered HTML Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: string multiLine: true Output # sample_field: |-Some multiline string value Known issues # The preview field is broken.

item.title: Number
item.description: Number # The number field generates a field for entering numbers. Both integers and floating numbers are allowed. It’s not possible to enter othert characters. Number Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: number Output # sample_field: 13.

item.title: Readonly
item.description: Readonly # The readonly field is shows a value but cannot be modified by the form user. The value can be a string or a number. Readonly Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: readonly Output # sample_field: some value

item.title: Select
item.description: Select # The select field generates a dropdown selectbox for selecting strings or numbers. The output is a number or string. If multiple is set true the out is an array of numbers or strings. Select field Select multiple field Select dropdown with options Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element multiple boolean optional (default false) Enable multiple selection options array of dictionaries mandatory Array with title/value pairs options.

item.title: String
item.description: String # The string field generates a field for entering strings. Multiline string values are allowed by enableing this property. Single line string Multi line string Properties # property value type optional description key string mandatory Keys are for internal use and must be unique title string mandatory The title of the element multiLine boolean optional (default false) Enable multi line value Sample # Configuration # key: sample_field title: Sample field type: string multiLine: true Output # sample_field: |-Some multiline string value
